Package Project

Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
Project.Transaction
public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
This class holds all the functionality and information for the transactions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Transaction()
    Empty order constructor for the GUI.
    Transaction​(int buyOrderID, int sellOrderID)
    Transaction Constructor without ID, database creates the ID.
    Transaction​(int transactionID, int buyOrderID, int sellOrderID)
    Transaction Constructor with ID.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.lang.Boolean addTransaction​(Transaction myTransaction)
    Adds a created transaction to the database.
    javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel getAllTransactions()
    Used to create table model for transactions in the GUI - lists all current transactions.
    static Transaction getTransaction​(int transactionID)
    Searches for a transaction in the database using the transaction ID and retrieves it.
    static java.lang.Boolean transactionExists​(int orderID)
    Searches for any ongoing transactions on an order in the database using the order ID to see if it exists.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Transaction

      public Transaction()
      Empty order constructor for the GUI.

    • Transaction

      public Transaction​(int buyOrderID, int sellOrderID)
      Transaction Constructor without ID, database creates the ID.
      Parameters:
      buyOrderID - The ID of the buy order of the transaction.
      sellOrderID - The ID of the sell order of the transaction.

    • Transaction

      public Transaction​(int transactionID, int buyOrderID, int sellOrderID)
      Transaction Constructor with ID.
      Parameters:
      transactionID - The ID of the transaction.
      buyOrderID - The ID of the buy order of the transaction.
      sellOrderID - The ID of the sell order of the transaction.

  • Method Details

    • addTransaction

      public static java.lang.Boolean addTransaction​(Transaction myTransaction)
      Adds a created transaction to the database.
      Parameters:
      myTransaction - The transaction to add.
      Returns:
      True if the transaction was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • getTransaction

      public static Transaction getTransaction​(int transactionID)
      Searches for a transaction in the database using the transaction ID and retrieves it.
      Parameters:
      transactionID - The ID of the transaction to find.
      Returns:
      The transaction if it exists, otherwise returns null.

    • transactionExists

      public static java.lang.Boolean transactionExists​(int orderID)
      Searches for any ongoing transactions on an order in the database using the order ID to see if it exists.
      Parameters:
      orderID - The ID of the order to check for transactions.
      Returns:
      True if the transactions exist, false otherwise. If the checking fails, it returns null.

    • getAllTransactions

      public javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel getAllTransactions() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Used to create table model for transactions in the GUI - lists all current transactions.
      Returns:
      A DefaultTableModel if the transactions could be found.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - when something goes wrong with the database.
